subject: [sugar] Sugar Monitor
body:
Hi,

I've wrote a simple external program called sugar-monitor based on
Developer Console, this program allow to see information about the
sugar sessions in a local machine reading the ~/.sugar path, at this
moment the LogViewer interface is just included... more features
coming soon..., path to download:

     http://dev.laptop.org/~edsiper/sugar-monitor.tar.gz

suggestions are welcome.

cheers.

Eduardo Silva.
_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@lists.laptop.org
http://lists.laptop.org/listinfo/sugar
